mods.abstract: In this edition of Christian Brothers College's underground student newspaper, the editors addressed the Vietnam War, school administration, and critics of the publication. Though "Sweet Thursday" had been anonymous for its history, this particular edition was signed by the editorial staff: Michael Dean, Martin Rice, Wayne Carrozza, Martin Connolly, James Coleman, Br. Joel Delpha, and John Carrara.

name.namePart: Michael J. Dean, Mike L. "Marty" Rice, Wayne Carrozza, James Coleman - staff members

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
